description: The rarity of true belief 正信希有分

description: No obtaining, no expounding 無得無說分

description: Emerging from the Dharma 依法出生分

description: The appearance without appearance 一相無相分

description: The adornment of pure lands 莊嚴淨土分

description: Unconditioned merits surpass all 無為福勝分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 12 Commentary
description: Venerating the true teachings 尊重正教分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 13 Commentary
description: Receiving and maintaining the Dharma 如法受持分

description: Leaving appearances: Nirvāṇa 離相寂滅分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 15 Commentary
description: The merits of maintaining this sūtra 持經功德分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 16 Commentary
description: Able to purify obstructions 能淨業障分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 17 Commentary
description: Ultimately without self 究竟無我分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 18 Commentary
description: Of a single unified perception 一體同觀分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 19 Commentary
description: Pervading the Dharma Realm 法界通分分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 20 Commentary
description: Leaving form, leaving appearance 離色離相分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 21 Commentary
description: No speaking, no dharma to speak 非說所說分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 22 Commentary
description: No dharmas may be grasped 無法可得分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 23 Commentary
description: The virtuous practice of a pure mind 淨心行善分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 24 Commentary
description: The merits of prajñā are incomparable 福智無比分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 25 Commentary
description: Transformations are not transformations 化無所化分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 26 Commentary
description: The Dharmakāya is without appearance 法身非相分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 27 Commentary
description: No severing, no annihilation 無斷無滅分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 28 Commentary
description: Not receiving, not desiring 不受不貪分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 29 Commentary
description: Power and position destroyed in silence 威儀寂淨分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 30 Commentary
description: The principle of the unity of appearances 一合理相分

source_name: Diamond Sūtra Chapter 31 Commentary
description: Unborn knowing and perceiving 知見不生分

description: Transforming the unreal 應化非真分
